phrases: Water.
Earth.
Fire.
Air.
Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
Absolutely not.
The Yu Yan archers stay here.
Your request is denied Commander Zhao.
Colonel Shinu, please reconsider.
Their precision is legendary.
The Yu Yan can pin a fly to a tree from a hundred yards away... without killing it.
You are wasting their talents using them as mere security guards.
I can do whatever I want with their talents.
They are my archers and what I say goes.
But my search for the Avatar is...
We are fighting a real war here and I need every man I have got, Commander.
But...
That is final!
I do not want to hear another word about it.
News from Fire Lord Ozai?
It appears I have been promoted to Admiral.
My request is now an order.
This should bring your fever down.
You know what I love about Appa the most?
His sense of humor.
That is nice.
I will tell him.
Classic Appa.
How is Sokka doing?
Not so good.
Being out in that storm really did a number on him.
I could not find any ginger root for the tea, but I found a map.
There is an herbalist institute on the top of that mountain.
We could probably find a cure for Sokka there.
Aang, he is in no condition to travel.
Sokka just needs more rest.
I am sure he will be better by tomorrow.
Not you too!
Relax, it was just a little cough.
I am fine...
That is how Sokka started yesterday.
Now look at him... he thinks he is an earthbender!
Take that, you rock!
A few more hours and you will be talking nonsense too.
I am going to find some medicine.
Uh, maybe it is safer if I go on foot.
Keep an eye on'them guys.
You guys are killin' me!
We have not been able to pick up the Avatar's trail since the storm.
But, if we continue heading northeast...
What do they want?
Perhaps a sporting game of Pai Sho!
The hunt for the Avatar has been given prime importance.
All information regarding the Avatar must be reported directly to Admiral Zhao.
Zhao has been promoted?
Well, good for him!
I have got nothing to report to Zhao.
Now get off my ship and let us pass.
Admiral Zhao is not allowing ships in or out of this area.
Off my ship!
Excellent!
I take the pot.
But, you are all improving.
I am certain you will win if we play again.
Says here that the Avatar can create tornados and run faster than the wind.
Pretty amazing.
Ehh, that is just a bunch of Fire Lord propaganda.
There is no way that is true.
Katara... please... water...
Listen carefully, Momo.
I need you to take this to the river and fill it with water.
Got it?
Hello!
I am sorry to barge in like this, but I need some medicine for my friends.
They have fevers and they have been coughing and...
Settle down, young man.
Your friends are going to be fine.
I have been up here for over fourty years you know, used to be others,...
That is nice.
Wounded Earth Kingdom troops still come by now and again, brave boys,...
That is nice.
Are you almost done?
Hold on, I just need to add one last ingredient.
Oh, sandalwood... oh, er, uh, that will not do, banana leaf?
Ah, nope, uh, ginger root, uh uh, oh where is that pesky little plant?
Is everything okay?
It is been almost an hour and you have not given the men an order.
I do not care what they do.
Do not give up hope yet.
You can still find the Avatar before Zhao.
How, Uncle?
With Zhao's resources it is just a matter of time before he captures the Avatar.
My honor, my throne, my country, I am about to lose them all.
Oh, here is what I was looking for!
Plum blossom!
Finally!
Thanks for all your help!
Hands off!
What do you think you are doing?
Taking the cure to my friends!
This is not a cure, it is Miyuki's dinner.
Plum blossom is her favorite.
What about my friends?
Well, all they need is some frozen wood frogs.
There is plenty of them down in the valley swamp.
What am I supposed to do with frozen frogs?
Why, suck on them of course!
Suck on them!?
The frog's skin excretes a substance that will cure your friends,...
You are insane are not you?
Thaaat's right.
Well, do not stand there all day.
Go!
Uhh, I think you dropped this.
A frog!
So this is the great Avatar?
Master of all the elements.
I do not know how you have managed to elude the Fire Nation for a hundred years,...
I have never hidden from you.
Untie me and I will fight you right now!
Uhh, no.
Tell me, how does it feel to be the only airbender left?
Do you miss your people?
Oh, do not worry, you will not be killed like they were.
See, if you die you will just be reborn...
So, I will keep you alive... but just barely.
Blow all the wind you want!
Your situation is futile.
There is no escaping this fortress... and no one is coming to rescue you.
Water...
Momo should be back any minute.
Ugh!
No, Momo, water.
Wa-ter!
Aang, what in the world is taking you so long?
All clear.
All clear.
Go on in.
We are the sons and daughters of fire!
The superior element!
Until today, only one thing stood in our path to victory.
The Avatar!
I am here to tell you that he is now my prisoner!
This is the year Sozen's comet returns to grant us its power!
This is the year the Fire Nation breaks through the walls of Ba Sing Se...
What?
No!
Do not leave frogs!
My friends are sick and they need you!
Please go back to being frozen!
Who are you?
What is going on?
Are you here to rescue me?
I will take that as a yes.
My frogs!
Come back!
And stop thawing out!
Wait!
My friends need to suck on those frogs!
How many times do I have to tell you, Momo, we need water.
Wa-ter.
Oh forget it.
Aang, please, hurry.
Who is this Aang kid you keep talking about, Your Highness?
I want a full transcription of my speech sent to the Fire Lord,...
Sir, should I hold off sending that speech to the Fire Lord?
There, on the wall!
The Avatar has escaped!
Close all the gates immediately!
Stay close to me!
Take this.
Jump on my back!
Give
Me the next one!
Hold your fire!
The Avatar must be captured alive!
Open the gate.
Admiral, what are you doing?
Let them out, now!
How could you let them go?
A situation like this requires... precision.
Do you have a clear shot?
Knock out the thief.
I will deliver him to the Fire Lord along with the Avatar.
Quick!
Recover the Avatar!
You know what the worst part about being born over a hundred years ago is?
I miss all the friends I used to hang out with.
Before the war started, I used to always my friend Kuzan.
The two of us, we would get in and out of so much trouble together.
He was one of the best friends I ever had...
If we knew each other back then, do you think we could have been friends too?
Where have you been, Prince Zuko?
You missed music night!
Lieutenant Jee sang a stirring love song.
I am going to bed.
No disturbances.
Suck on these.
They will make you feel better.
Aang, how was your trip?
Did you make any new friends?
No, I do not think I did.
This is tasty!
